title: Could not find documents for executing gazebo on a remote PC from gazebo_ros package.

content.raw:
I want to execute gazebo 5 on a remote PC from gazebo_ros(ros indigo) package on local PC.
But I could not find any documents for it.
Would you show me a sample launch file and some environment variable settings.

I already succeeded it on local PC with combination of gazebo 5 and gazebo_ros(ros indigo) by reading https://github.com/nkoenig/pioneer3at_demo .

Thank you.

P.S.
Before 6 hours, I created a same issue as an anonymous.
Please leave it or remove it.
content.html:
